name: parasol
content:
parasol noun [C]
(SUNSHADE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of sunshade (= round frame covered in cloth on a stick) carried especially by women in the past, to give protection from the sun
TimArbaev/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

parasol noun [C]
(MUSHROOM)
a type of mushroom with a large round top part
Jason Jones Travel Photography/Moment/GettyImages
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of umbrella (= round cloth-covered frame on a stick) carried by women, esp. in the past, for protection from the sun
